quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Guolian Minsheng Securities Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Guolian Minsheng Securities Co. Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Guolian Minsheng Securities Co Ltd, is a China-based company principally engaged in securities related business. The Company operates six segments. The Brokerage and Wealth Management Business segment is mainly engaged in wealth management, fund investment advisory, and financial product sales. The Credit Trading Business segment is mainly engaged in margin trading and securities lending, as well as stock pledge style repurchase business. The Investment Banking Business segment is mainly engaged in equity financing, bond financing, and financial advisory services. The Securities Investment Business Segment is mainly engaged in equity securities investment business, fixed income business, and equity derivative business. The Asset Management and Investment Business Segment is mainly engaged in securities asset management business, public fund management business, and private equity investment business. The Company also operates through the Others Business segment.
